pr_title: prevent Besu starting in GoQuorum mode on Mainnet

timeline.message:
prevent mainnet + goquorum

Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane <sally.macfarlane@consensys.net>
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/hyperledger/besu into no-gq-privacy-mainnet

timeline.bodyText: what needs to happen if it is not present?
timeline.author: pinges

replies.bodyText: if you don't specify chainId in genesis, it uses network if provided (cmd line) and if not provided then it's mainnet
replies.author: macfarla

replies.bodyText: the validation against chainId is in a different place to network (because we don't read genesis file until later) but it might make sense to to them both later, together, to make it easier to read
replies.author: macfarla

timeline.bodyText: Could you use the valid quorum genesis file here with chainId 1?
timeline.author: pinges

replies.bodyText: but it's used in two spots (and the other one doesn't add chainId) so I think it's clearer to use the constant
replies.author: macfarla
